description: I appreciate there being a simple way to customize the power draw and noise of my computer. The app doesn't have every feature I might want but it does have the basics I need which I would have to jump through hoops to achieve on a non-Tuxedo laptop. Many laptops won't even allow you to control the fan speed; I'm glad I can do so on my Pulse 14 Gen3!

Pretty lame that they advertise works for all computers, but dont tell you to remove Tuxedo-Tomte which is useless to non Tuxedo computers, and even if you remove the Tuxedo Contol Center (mostly geared for their computers), you cannot remove the app from appearing on the main menu, even once properly removed
